ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] EverQuest on TechTV
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey thanks for the info Wulfric, I ll be watching! One thing though, I would like to remind a few on this list that if we get poked fun at, don t get mad. If
ygData.messageBody:
Hey thanks for the info Wulfric, I'll be watching!

One thing though, I would like to remind a few on this list that if we
get poked fun at, don't get mad. If you all will remember, a while back
someone from TechTV, (A segment producer I think), was looking for
people to be on the show and posted here. In turn he got flamed by
several on this list. :(


Laters!

-----Original Message-----
Message: 8
Date: Tue, 21 Jan 2003 16:27:03 -0500
From: "Ron Gillespie" <wulftech@...>
Subject: EverQuest on TechTV

For those interested who get TechTV on their cable system, check out
Call For Help this Friday. Check local listings for time. They are
doing a segment on Everquest. It should prove to be informative and
entertaining. I hear they're even going to interview some unsuspecting
EverQuest fanatic.

Wulfric
